channel.title: Server running probs
channel.description: Hey my brother asked me to make a server so i decided to try and i dont know what to put in the classpath and path but i have latest java the _07 so if you can help thx..

item.title: Server running probs
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

for classpath add his for value C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
for path add this for value C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;
its stormcutter’s tut. worked for me just change the _06 to ur java _07

Read full topic
